About Me
I am 5th year Ph.D student working with Prof. Max Welling. During my Ph.D program, I have focused on scaling-up Bayesian inference for Big Data. I (with collaborators) have developed mini-batch and distributed MCMC algorithms and applied to various applications and models such as topic modeling, recommendation systems, social network analysis, and neural networks. Along with Bayesian inference for machine learning, I'm also interested in learning deep neural networks in application to computer vision and natural language understanding.


Working Papers

Scalable Markov Chain Monte Carlo for Overlapping Community Detection
W. Li, S. Ahn, and M. Welling
